import logo from './logo.svg'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import hiking from './components/imgs/toomas-tartes-yizrl9n_eda-unsplash.jpg'; import skating from './components/imgs/brian-kyed-wcp9mk0iisu-unsplash.jpg'; import canoeing from './components/imgs/atia-naim-gtmgPEQiH40-unsplash.jpg'; import kidSkiing from './components/imgs/pexels-visit-almaty-848618.jpg'; import adultSkiing from './components/imgs/banff-sunshine-village-uobe_wj-suk-unsplash.jpg'; import snowshoeing from './components/imgs/sivasankara-reddy-bommireddy-ymvbfgmaoxs-unsplash.jpg'; import './App.css'; import Header from './components/Header'; import Excursions from './components/Excursions'; import Excursion from './components/Excursion'; import ExcursionInfo from './components/ExcursionInfo'; import { useState } from 'react'; const App = () => { const [excursionList] = useState([ { id: 1, title: '2 Hour Guided Hike', duration: '2 Hours', cost: 35, season: 'All', tag: 'There is no better way to discover Canada’s natural beauty than on a hiking trip. From West to East and into the unspoiled beauty of the North, hiking in Canada offers a great opportunity to reconnect with nature. We offer hiking tours across many remote locations in Canada as well as prominent areas such as the national and provincial parks. Regardless of the location, you choose you’ll enjoy a truly unforgettable adventure exploring wild and untouched Canadian landscape.', description: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque dui turpis, sagittis eu finibus id, volutpat in ante. Nam eu ultrices felis. Sed interdum consequat velit.', imgUrl: './imgs/test.jpg' }, { id: 2, title: 'Ice Skating', duration: '3 Hours', cost: 50, season: 'All', tag: 'A favourite Canadian sport that is fun for all ages and abilities, ice skating in Banff and Lake Louise is a great way to enjoy the fresh mountain air with family and friends. Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of your surroundings or maybe join in a game of pick-up, or “shinny” hockey. Then take a break and warm up with hot cocoa beside a bonfire before heading back out on the ice for more. ', description: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
